ygData.subject: Re: root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is less effective in PvP combat.  All other situations it has been functioning normally.  By the way, I keep here people saying that they never rooted
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:

> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> I heard rumours that they made root less effective for us in this last patch
> in an effort to make PVP servers more balanced. Any truth to this? That
> would definitely suck! All the more reason to group now then ever.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
> 28th Veeshan (one more level till we fly the Lim'Dul skies)

It is less effective in PvP combat. All other situations it has been
functioning normally. By the way, I keep here people saying that they never
rooted before 12. Did you solo? What was your tatics? I started rooting and
nuking at 4 and I haven't stopped since. Even if it kept the mob off of me 1/4
of the fight, it was still meant the difference of life or death to me. By
level 10ish (I think, its been a while since then) I was rooting Grizzleys in
the Karanas, and often finishing them off before root would break.
